column4: and since he absolutely wanted to make music i decided to give him a street organ and a violin. the latter, he responded, sounds terrible and he happily walked away with the turning organ. and that, my friend, is the tragedy of the operating system
i dunno i always thinks thats appropriate when someone compains linux is harder than windows :-p
oh, I prefer mentioning that Microsoft has the same abbreviation as Multiple Sclerosis. In a way, they are similar.
